forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 85. Southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. South southwest wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 42. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
